H0.text: Layers are the property that students are most likely observing when they compare two different rocks that are both bright and spotted.

H1.text: Textures are the property that students are most likely observing when they compare two bright and spotted rocks.

H2.text: Colors are the property that students are most likely observing when they compare two bright and spotted rocks.

H3.text: Ages are the property that students are most likely observing when comparing two different bright and spotted rocks.
